import React, {useRef, useState, useEffect} from 'react'; import "../Css/CaraOSello.css"; function CaraOSello({ enviar, cara, sello, resultadoCalculo, respuesta, historial, setMountedHistorial, ref}){ const referenciaHistorial = useRef(null); return(




{historial} {setMountedHistorial}
); }; export default CaraOSello;
